message.content:
cs.CR, cs.SY, cs.SE, cs.MM, cs.OS

Reasoning: 
1. cs.CR (Cryptography and Security) - The paper proposes a security mechanism to prevent attacks on mobile devices, which falls under the scope of cryptography and security.
2. cs.SY (Systems and Control) - The paper proposes an extension to the SELinux reference monitor integrated into the Android operating system, which involves system-level control and falls under the scope of systems and control.
3. cs.SE (Software Engineering) - The paper involves designing and implementing a security mechanism for mobile devices, which falls under the scope of software engineering.
4. cs.MM (Multimedia) - The paper focuses on preventing attacks on audio channels in mobile devices, which falls under the scope of multimedia.
5. cs.OS (Operating Systems) - The paper proposes an extension to the SELinux reference monitor integrated into the Android operating system, which involves operating system-level control and falls under the scope of operating systems.
